summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6141 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 4, University Gardens Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue Northeast and 37th Avenue Northeast, from East 62nd Street to East 65th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85501, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
